original_text: For when the people were mustered, behold, not one of the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead was there.
korean_text: 백성을 계수할 때에 야베스 길르앗 주민이 하나도 거기 없음을 보았음이라

sentences.original_text: For when the people were mustered,
not one of the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead was there.
sentences.korean_translation: 야베스길르앗 주민 중 한 사람도 거기에 없었다.
